title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' has no effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item does not disappear as expected.
OB: Currently, when using the new PDF emitter, if the display property of an item is set to 'none', the label is still visible in the generated PDF.
EB: Expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label should disappear in the generated PDF.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label on the form.
2. Open the 'Properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Preview the form in PDF and observe that the label is still visible in the generated PDF.
